model.database

Class StocksTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.database.DatabaseTable
      • model.database.StocksTable

  • public class StocksTable
extends DatabaseTable
    Contains methods that run SQL queries relevant to the Stocks Table Buy and selling of stock as well as updating the prices and dividend is also handled here
    Since:
    30/10/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul King - s3449513

      • getStock

        public Stock getStock(java.lang.String code)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the Stocks table for an individual stock matching a company code
        Parameters:
        code - takes the company code as an argument. This is unique
        Returns:
        returns a stock object created from the result set
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getStocksOwned

        public java.util.List<Stock> getStocksOwned(int userId)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the stock table, returning all stocks owned by a particular trading account using the user account id
        Parameters:
        userId - this is the id foreign key referencing the trading account
        Returns:
        returns a list of the type 'Stock' built from the result set
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getStocksOwned

        public java.util.List<Stock> getStocksOwned(java.lang.String email)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries the stock table, returning all stocks owned by a particular trading account using the user account email address/username
        Parameters:
        email - takes the name of the user account as an argument for referencing
        Returns:
        returns a list of the type 'Stock' built from the result set
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • transferStock

        public boolean transferStock(TradingAccount buyer,
                             TradingAccount seller,
                             Stock stock,
                             int amount,
                             float price)
        Transfers ownership of the stock from one account to the other by updating the owner id in Stocks table
        Parameters:
        buyer - The account that is purchasing the stock
        seller - The account that is selling the stock (Note: this can include the company themselves)
        stock - takes a full stock object which contains the company code
        amount - the amount of stocks being purchased of the specified company. Set this argument to 1
        price - the price of the stock determining the amount of money involved in the transaction
        Returns:
        returns true on success, false on failure

      • transferStock

        public boolean transferStock(TradingAccount buyer,
                             TradingAccount seller,
                             java.lang.String stockCode,
                             int amount,
                             float price)
        Transfers ownership of the stock from one account to the other by updating the owner id in Stocks table
        Parameters:
        buyer - The account that is purchasing the stock
        seller - The account that is selling the stock (Note: this can include the company themselves)
        stockCode - takes the company code as a string referencing matching code in the database
        amount - the amount of stocks being purchased of the specified company. Set this argument to 1
        price - the price of the stock determining the amount of money involved in the transaction
        Returns:
        returns true on success, false on failure

      • generateStartingPrices

        public void generateStartingPrices(float lowestCost,
                                   float highestCost)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        This is called before the start of the game to generating the initial market price of stocks from each company at random
        Parameters:
        lowestCost - sets the minimum cost of a stock
        highestCost - sets the highest cost of a stock
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        public void updateMarket()
